title: BooknRead
description: This website is my pride and joy, for two reasons. First being that I was able to check out how modals worked and it has been my favorite thing to add to website since. Second, I really love books. It was also a great learning experience in using contenful for my books and then populating them.

title: Frizzy
description: This was a group project, in which my main job was the front end. I pulled the information from the backend and populated inside of a page of page. this was really challenging in that I had to make sure that the state and props had to go where they needed to go. One small error messes it all up, but it was so rewarding when I got everything to their desired pages

title: K-Drama Love
description: This project, I wanted to get my hands at Angular, so this project was the first one I did with Angular in the front end. I worked with a partner, they did the back end and and I did the front end. The hardes part was being able to show the actors and their names correctly, but I was able to solve this from research. Instead of *ngFor('shows of kdsrv.shows') I had to use *ngFor('actors of shows.actors'). Click the image to check it out!

title: VideoGame
description: This site I wanted to focus on python/django for my back end creating new entries and using React Router 6 along with React Player and a search bar. It was interesting to learn the new ways React Router does thing and that was part of my biggest challenge but I learned pretty quickly.
